channel.title: StreamInsight on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in StreamInsight on Niels Berglund

item.title: Stream and Complex Event Processing from a Relational Guy's Eye
item.description: This is a re-post from my previous blog. However, as that blog has now gone to the big blog repository in the sky (or wherever blogs go to when they are no more), I decided to repost this, seeing how CEP and StreamInsight are becoming more and more popular.
